title: S14 Ep80: Documented Cases of Pure Evil: The Hatman
itunes:title: Documented Cases of Pure Evil: The Hatman
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS has Documented Cases of Pure Evil: The Hatman with guest Kyle Macias.

Shadow people, the Djinn, Aliens, Demons or something even more sinister is sliding between dimensions and today we discuss some of the most harrowing cases from the new, chilling documentary, The Hat Man: Documented Cases of Pure Evil.

Watch the Documentary here: https://vimeo.com/ondemand/thehatmanfilm

Or get it on DVD or On Demand here:
https://amazon.com
